name: Final Link
description:
Final Link is an adventure game where you will do quests, solve puzzles and beat the old record on a race track. You main mission is to find a power crystal. You need the crystal so that you can activate a portal, so that you can get back home to your own dimension.

The game  was made in 12 weeks, in Unreal Engine, as an attempt to create a 3-act structure while following a Hero's Journey template. 

Approximate game time: 30 minutes

If you are making a playthrough video please let me know since they give me a lot of great feedback to future design thoughts. All kind of written feedback are as well much appreciated. 

The game is not optimized in some areas, so you might experience framdrops and graphical issues. But hopefully you will have a good time playing it anyway!
